        Commands

        Element commands

        Used within a trial to manipulate elements.

        Action commands

        Click to expand/collapse
        • audio.once
        • audio.pause
        • audio.play
        • audio.wait
        • button.callback
        • button.click
        • button.once
        • button.wait
        • key.wait
        • standard.print

        Test commands

        Click to expand/collapse
        • audio.test.hasPlayed
        • audio.test.playing
        • button.test.pressed
        • standard.test.printed

        Global commands

        Used outside of a trial to manipulate the experiment as a whole.

        Click to expand/collapse
        • PennController.AddHost
        • PennController.AddTable
        • PennController.ResetPrefix

        Special commands

        Used within a trial, but do not manipulate elements.

        Click to expand/collapse
        • clear
        • end
        • fullscreen
